validationMessage.email: Please enter a valid email address
validationMessage.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validationMessage.passwordMaxLength: Password must be no longer than 20 characters
validationMessage.passwordNotOneOf: New password not be the same as the current password
validationMessage.upperCase: Include at least one uppercase letter in your password
validationMessage.lowerCase: Include at least one lowercase letter in your password
validationMessage.specialCharacter: Include at least one special character (e.g., !, @, #)
validationMessage.oneNumber: Include at least one numerical digit in your password
validationMessage.passwordMatch: Passwords must match the New Password
